titleStmt.title: An elegy, on the death of the reverend, learned. and pious William Bell, D.D. vicar of S. Sepulchres; who died July the 19th, 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Moore, & J. Ashburne, for Joseph Roberts, at the Bible in Fleet-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "What bell is that? I fear it will be se'd ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
